mapper.select: select order_num, c_id, s_code, order_status, order_date, o_totalprice from order_list ol where c_id=#{c_id} order by ol.order_num desc

mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_LIST (order_num, c_id, s_code, order_status, order_date, o_totalprice) values (#{order_num},#{c_id},#{s_code},#{order_status},sysdate,#{o_totalprice})
